name: AIUB CS FEST 2024 - 1st Runner Up
desc: Achieved 1st Runner-Up in the App Showcase category at AIUB CS FEST 2024. Competed against 20+ teams, demonstrating innovative mobile application development and presentation skills to industry judges.

name: Published Research - Taylor & Francis
desc: Published 'Beyond NER: Medical BERTs for Multi-Label ADR Classification' at IDAA 2025 (Taylor & Francis Book Chapter). Research on fine-tuning LLMs for healthcare AI applications.

name: GitHub Open Source Contributor
desc: Active open source contributor with 36+ GitHub stars and 26 repositories. Top project: StudentManagementSystem with 17 stars and comprehensive Wiki documentation.

name: South Asian Climate Conference 2024
desc: Recognized for participation and presentation at the South Asian Climate Conference 2024. Presented research on emerging climate issues with statistical analysis for the South Asian region.

name: Sentiment Analysis - 85-90% Accuracy
desc: Built NLP sentiment classifier analyzing 52,702 Spotify reviews achieving 85-90% classification accuracy using MultinomialNB and TF-IDF vectorization.

name: Mario's Multiverse Adventure - YouTube Demo
desc: Led team of 5 to develop 2D platformer with OpenGL for AIUB Computer Graphics course. Created 3 unique game levels with physics engine and published YouTube gameplay demo.

name: 54+ Android Development Lessons
desc: Completed comprehensive Android development curriculum from beginner to advanced. Mastered MVVM architecture, Retrofit, Hilt, RxJava3, Room Database, and Firebase integration.

name: CPE Conference Presentation
desc: Presented at the South Asian Climate Conference 2024, sharing research and findings on climate challenges and solutions.
